mapper.insert: INSERT INTO record (user_id, activity_id, prize_name, prize_type) VALUES (#{userId}, #{activityId}, #{prizeName}, #{prizeType})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM record WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT u.username, r.prize_name, r.create_time FROM record r JOIN sys_user u ON r.user_id = u.id WHERE r.prize_type = 1 ORDER BY r.create_time DESC LIMIT #{limit}
